code: import{UPDATE_DRIVER}from"./types";import{UPDATE_KART}from"./types";import{UPDATE_TIRE}from"./types";import{UPDATE_GLIDER}from"./types";import{LOAD_INIT}from"./types";import{ADD_TO_CART}from"./types";import{DELETE_BUILD}from"./types";import MKData from"../assets/MK8-data.js";import{v4 as uuidv4}from"uuid";export var loadInit=function loadInit(){return{type:LOAD_INIT,initState:{driver:MKData[40],kart:MKData[0],tire:MKData[83],glider:MKData[104]}};};export var updateDriver=function updateDriver(driverID){return{type:UPDATE_DRIVER,driverID:driverID};};export var updateKart=function updateKart(kartID){return{type:UPDATE_KART,kartID:kartID};};export var updateTire=function updateTire(tireID){return{type:UPDATE_TIRE,tireID:tireID};};export var updateGlider=function updateGlider(gliderID){return{type:UPDATE_GLIDER,gliderID:gliderID};};export var addToCart=function addToCart(driverID,kartID,tireID,gliderID){return{type:ADD_TO_CART,id:uuidv4(),driverID:driverID,kartID:kartID,tireID:tireID,gliderID:gliderID};};export var deleteBuild=function deleteBuild(buildID){return{type:DELETE_BUILD,buildID:buildID};};
